maml:section.maml:title: Summary
maml:section.maml:para: This monitor checks if the Configuration Manager client is installed.

maml:section.maml:title: Causes
maml:section.maml:para: If the below registry key is not found, it's assumed the client is not installed and an alert is generated.

maml:section.maml:title: Resolutions
maml:section.maml:para: Install the client software and the alert will automatically close.
